body_html:
I forgot to mention, you have to do the go get of: github.com/alonsovidales/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/go instead of the go get from the tensorflow repository since the code is still not merged.
After do the go get you are going to get back an error because the code is not in the right path, now you have to do:

$ cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/alonsovidales/tensorflow
$ git checkout go_bindings_tensors
$ ln -s $GOPATH/src/github.com/alonsovidales $GOPATH/src/github.com/tensorflow

and try the go get again with the final path:

$ go get github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/go

After merge the code it has to work as it is specified on the README.md file.

body:
I forgot to mention, you have to do the `go get` of: `github.com/alonsovidales/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/go` instead of the go get from the tensorflow repository since the code is still not merged.
After do the go get you are going to get back an error because the code is not in the right path, now you have to do:

``` sh
$ cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/alonsovidales/tensorflow
$ git checkout go_bindings_tensors
$ ln -s $GOPATH/src/github.com/alonsovidales $GOPATH/src/github.com/tensorflow 
```

and try the go get again with the final path:

``` sh
$ go get github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/go
```

After merge the code it has to work as it is specified on the README.md file.
